abstract: Despite some build-up by civil rights groups, just 11 protesters lined the sidewalk outside the Capitol Hill Club at an event for Representative Steve Scalise, under fire for appearing in front of white supremacists more than a decade ago.
snippet: Despite some build-up by civil rights groups, just 11 protesters lined the sidewalk outside the Capitol Hill Club at an event for Representative Steve Scalise, under fire for appearing in front of white supremacists more than a decade ago.

headline.main: At Scalise Event, Protesters Outnumber Reporters. Barely.
